com.attivio.sdk.search.fields

Class MultiaryFieldExpression

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.attivio.sdk.search.fields.FieldExpression
      • com.attivio.sdk.search.fields.MultiaryFieldExpression
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Cloneable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BooleanExpression, Coalesce, Concat, Union

    public abstract class MultiaryFieldExpression
extends FieldExpression
    Abstract FieldExpression that takes an arbitrary number of FieldExpressions as arguments.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
